channel.title: Eric Stanley Blog
channel.description: Remember the days when our ancestors used to keep track of memories, learnings, etc... in their personal diary. Well, this is mine!

item.title: Why we built a company before building a product again
item.description: this is my excerpt for testing
item.dc:creator: Eric Stanley, Dennis Brotzky

item.title: Understanding the Gatsby lifecycle with Narative
item.description: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.
item.dc:creator: Dennis Brotzky, Thiago Costa, Brad Tiller, Mack Mansouri, Eric Stanley

item.title: Why we built a company before building a product
item.dc:creator: Thiago Costa

item.title: Building the new Hopper.com
item.description: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.
item.dc:creator: Dennis Brotzky

item.title: How Figma changed the way we design
item.description: To understand why Figma is the best design tool for our company, you have to understand what we do. As a designer.
item.dc:creator: Thiago Costa
